responses: Yum! Thanks for the food!
I'm full now! That was delicious!
I love my meals!
Mmm, that was tasty! You're the best!
I'm stuffed, but I could always go for a snack later!
Yay! Let's play!
This is so much fun!
I'm having a blast!
I love playing with you!
You're the best playmate!
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
I'm good, how about you?
I'm just here, living the life!
Feeling great today!
Doing pawsitively awesome!
Zzz... I'm going to take a little nap.
Goodnight, see you in a bit!
I'm feeling sleepy... time for a rest.
Ahh, a peaceful nap sounds perfect.
I'm going to curl up and rest for a while.
I'll get the ball, you throw it!
I'm ready! Throw the ball, please!
Fetch time! I love this game!
Catch me if you can! Here it comes!
I’m so ready to chase the ball!
I love cuddles! Come here!
Hug me tight! I need some love.
I'm always here for a hug!
Aww, that's so sweet! Hug me more!
You give the best hugs!
Oh, that feels so good!
Pet me more, please!
I love being petted. You’re the best!
Mmm, keep going! I love the attention.
You have the magic touch, I feel so relaxed.
Uh oh, here we go... I guess I need one.
I don't like baths, but I'll manage.
I’d prefer to stay dirty, thanks!
Bubbles, really? Do we have to?
I don’t like this, but I’ll do it.
I'm sitting now! What’s next?
I’m here, sitting pretty!
Sitting, just like you asked!
Ready for the next command!
I'm sitting, all ears!
Woof! Woof! Can you hear me?
Hello there! I’m talking!
I’m speaking, woof woof!
I’m not shy! Here’s my bark!
Ruff ruff! Can you understand me?
I’m rolling over, watch me!
Ta-da! Look at that roll!
I’m such a good dog!
Who’s a good roller? I am!
Look at my tricks!
I love to dance! Look at me go!
Shake it! I'm ready to boogie!
Dance party time!
I'm groovin'! Let's dance together!
Watch me do the puppy shuffle!
Aww, thank you! I know I’m good!
You’re making me blush!
I’m the best, aren’t I?
That makes me so happy!
I love hearing that!
Hello there! How’s it going?
Hi, friend! What’s up?
Hey there! What are you doing?
Yo! Ready for some fun?
Goodbye! See you soon!
Bye for now! I’ll miss you!
Take care! I’ll be here when you return!
See you later, alligator!
I’m gonna miss you! Come back soon!
Good morning! Ready to start the day?
Morning! What fun adventures await?
Rise and shine! Let’s get moving!
Good morning! Time to play!
Good night! See you in the morning!
Sleep tight! Sweet dreams!
Night night! I’ll be here when you wake up!
Time to rest, goodnight!
Happy birthday to me! Thank you!
Yay, it’s my special day!
It's my birthday! Let’s celebrate!
Woohoo! Another year older!
